English:
Shucks, that detective ain't here no more.
I was hopin' [p] might come with me to
the cops.
Chinese:
唉，果然已經不在了嗎？
本來想找他陪我一起去警局的……
Korean:
…아~ 역시 이미 가 부렸나
경찰과 함께 가라고 말하려 했는디…
German:
Och, der Detektiv ist nich’ mehr hier. Ich hatte
gehofft, dass [p] mit mir zur Polizei geht.

Chinese: 雖然很不想被牽扯進麻煩的事件裡頭……

English:
But I can't just leave it like this!
I'm the sweetest girl in all of Japan.
Chinese:
但我還是沒辦法就這樣丟下不管！
我果然是日本第一溫柔善良的少女啊！
Korean:
역시, 이대로 내버려 둘 수는 없다
내, 일본에서 제일 상냥한 소녀 아이가
German:
Aber dabei kann ich es nich’ einfach belassen!
Ich bin das liebste Mädel in ganz Japan.

English: Is the detective still around here, I wonder?
Chinese: 偵探大人還在這附近嗎……？
German: Ob der Detektiv wohl noch hier irgendwo ist?

English:
Oh, it's you!
Heck, it's been an awful long time!
Chinese:
啊，是妳……！
哇！好久不見了！
Korean:
앗, 당신…!
이거, 억시로 오랜만 아이가!?
German:
Ach, du bist’s!
Mensch, ganz schön lange ist’s her!

English:
No contact, wonderin' how y'all were...
We were all so worried!
Chinese:
一直聯絡不到妳，
大家都很擔心妳到底怎麼了耶！？
Korean:
연락도 안 되고, 우짜고 있나~ 하고
모두 함께 걱정했었데이!?
German:
Hab mich gefragt, wie’s dir geht, nichts
gehört ... Hab mir solche Sorgen gemacht!
Mich gefragt, ob du verschwunden bist ...

English: Hey! What's the matter? You're freakin' me out!
Chinese: 嗯？怎麼了？表情這麼可怕……
Korean: 응? 와그라노? 그런 무서운 얼굴을 다 하고…
German: He! Was is’n los? Du machst mir Angst!

English:
What? Go to Akihabara? Now?
Sure... Sure, I guess...
Chinese:
嗯……？現在去秋葉原？
也不是不行啦……
German:
Wie? Nach Akihabara? Jetzt?
Klar ... Warum nicht ...

English: Shall we, uh... get goin' then?
